message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $12,000.  I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is quite valuable to me. Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am able to offer $10,000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
